author: Space Wizards
install_msg: Successfully installed the SS14 Game Server Status cog! Setup documentation can be found [here](https://docs.spacestation14.com/en/server-hosting/setting-up-redbot.html#game-server-status).
name: SS14 and SS13 Game Server Status
short: Shows the status of your SS14 servers.
description: Shows the status of your Space Station 14 servers that include map, player count, round lenght, and more. Also supports Space Station 13 servers and qstat compatible games.
